name: ART WISDOMS VOL. 5
description:
Formatted with Electric Zine Maker by @alienmelon

5 Wives Won't Make You Wise. Only Art Wisdoms Can Learninize. This is the 5th way to become the perfect artist from the perfect artist, named Rock, who is a rock. It comes after the 4th volume and before the 6th volume. If you don't know who Rock is you should read volume 1. There are 10 volumes in total.

Volume 5 will be free during the 2nd week of April 2020.

I have 1 extra file to add, a folding guide that I wrote and drew myself. I haven't been back to my house since January 2020, I don't know which device the file is on, and I don't have the hard copy. Just google "8 page zine folding guide" until I find it.
